Hemiechinus.hDesc: Smaller than European hedgehogs, when found in the wild this domesticated breed will often hibernate for short periods of time in summer and winter. Long-eared hedgehog breeds are naturally parasite prone, so be sure to source one from a reputable dealer if you would like to keep one as a pet.

The last of four domesticated hedgehog breeds, these animals are native to India and Pakistan. This means that the Indian Long-Eared hedgehog can handle both extreme heat and extreme cold much better than most hedgehogs.
